SEARCH
Package com.app.processing

Interface DataProcessing

All Known Implementing Classes:
DataProcessingImpl
public interface DataProcessing
Interface representing the operations that can be performed for data processing. Provides methods to add, remove, update users and data, as well as to retrieve pattern occurrences, modify data, and save files.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addUser(User user, DataImpl dataImpl)
    Adds a user with associated data.

    Gets the occurrences of a pattern in the data associated with the specified user.

    Gets the occurrences of a pattern in the content associated with the specified filename for the specified user.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      void addUser(User user, DataImpl dataImpl)
      Adds a user with associated data.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object representing the user
      dataImpl - the DataImpl object representing the data associated with the user
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user or dataImpl is null, or if the user already exists

    • removeUser

      void removeUser(User user)
      Removes the specified user.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object representing the user
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user is null or does not exist

    • updateData

      void updateData(User user, DataImpl dataImpl)
      Updates the data associated with the specified user.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object representing the user
      dataImpl - the DataImpl object representing the new data
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user or dataImpl is null, or if the user does not exist

    • getPatternOccurrences

      long getPatternOccurrences(User user, String regex)
      Gets the occurrences of a pattern in the data associated with the specified user.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object representing the user
      regex - the regular expression pattern to count occurrences of
      Returns:
      the number of occurrences of the pattern
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user or regex is null, if regex is empty, or if the user does not exist

    • getPatternOccurrences

      long getPatternOccurrences(User user, String regex, Filename filename)
      Gets the occurrences of a pattern in the content associated with the specified filename for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object representing the user
      regex - the regular expression pattern to count occurrences of
      filename - the Filename object representing the filename
      Returns:
      the number of occurrences of the pattern in the content associated with the filename
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user, regex, or filename is null, if regex is empty, if the user does not exist, or if the file does not exist

    • modifyData

      void modifyData(User user, Filename fileName, String newContent)
      Modifies the content associated with the specified filename for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object representing the user
      fileName - the Filename object representing the filename
      newContent - the new content to be associated with the filename
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user, fileName, or newContent is null, if newContent is empty, if the user does not exist, if the file does not exist, or if the user is not an administrator

    • saveFile

      void saveFile(User user, Filename filename, Save<String> save)
      Saves the content associated with the specified filename for the specified user using the provided save mechanism.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object representing the user
      filename - the Filename object representing the filename
      save - the Save instance used to save the content
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user, filename, or save is null, if the user does not exist, if the user is not an administrator, or if the file does not exist
